text: 20:3 Daniel 6:17; Jut 1:6; Akar Mogomem 16:14-16; 20:8Egha ensel a inigha anekunizɨ, a mozir bar konim giraghu. Egha mozir torimɨn akam apɨrigha anepaghapaki, eghtɨ an azenan izan kogham. Eghtɨ Satan nguazimɨn itir gumazamiziba ua me gifaran kogh mangɨtɨ 1,000plan azeniba gɨvagham. Eghtɨ gɨn ensel uam a fɨrightɨ a bar dughiar otevimra ikiam.
